What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $75,000. This money will be divided up between different services within the company: Services such as higher security that will protect your personal information within the app, cloud space that will allow us to host and store more data to allow more students and tutors access to the app, and marketing, that will allow us to reach more people that are seeking the opportunity for educational assistance.
We are offering perks that include credits for sessions and Tutgo accessories and apparel.

The Supreme Tutgo Development Team is committed to bringing users the most efficient, convenient, a simplified tutoring experience.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Please like and share this campaign and spread the word as much as possible!
Don't forget that Indiegogo also has share tools available!

Additional Information
All rewards includes a pass to TutGo's Official Launch Party. 
TutGo is a free app to download in the Apple and Google Play stores.
Please check out our website landing page for more information. If you have any additional questions regarding our campaign, feel free to email us at info@mytutgo.com
Thank you,TutGo Supreme Team!

story:
Who we are

We are 20 teenagers from Swaziland, in Africa, from a new Montessori High School, the first of its kind in Swaziland.

 Our motto is “hand in hand” we learn and we are a community working together for the future – "Lilima" means work together in siSwati, the local language in Swaziland.  

Our school is a registered Non profit, NGO and we are just completing the first year of its existence.  We are laying the foundation of a new approach to education in Swaziland and want to make our contribution to the school. Through this crowd fund we would like you to help us build our school.

About our school

Our school is a family which is supportive, appreciative, grateful, and thankful for everything that we have no matter how little.

Our school is wonderful, it’s innovative, we learn things that other teenagers don’t normally learn at school!

We have learned to cook our school lunches, we grow our own vegetables, we clean our classrooms...we all help in our community. 

 
   

We don’t dream about success we work at it!

We work together and we choose to accept everyone’s opinion and that everyone has rights, and no one is wrong and we choose to be kind over being right!

Why do we need to fundraise?  We want to contribute…as students

As Montessori students we are learning about running our own Not-for-profit and exploring different ways to source funding. We want to contribute to the building of our school, so we would like to raise money for some school equipment. Our school sports are basketball, netball and football.   Currently we have to travel to other venues for our sports. Luckily we have been able to source funds to build our own sports field next year. However we also need basketball hoops and football goals.  We also would like to set up a pottery studio so that we can make pottery to sell at our school shop.  Our other wish is to add some equipment to the music department.

This is our wish list:

Basketball hoop and stand- Approx USD 1,600

Soccer goal posts, a net and some new balls- Approx USD 200

Netball goal posts- Approx USD 100

A second hand piano and a drum set- Approx  USD 800

A small pottery kiln and potters wheel- Approx  USD 1,500

Art materials including modelling clay-  Approx USD 900

THANK YOU!!!

We have been busy making beautiful handmade gifts to say thank you for your generous donations. See the list of perks to the right for pictures and more information.

story:
The problem with other language learning solutions

The biggest obstacle that every language learner faces when speaking a new language is the fear of feeling judged or embarrassed when you make a mistake. 

Language learning apps today are primarily built around only using your fingers, instead of helping you improve your speaking skills in real-life conversations.

 

Rype GO is reinventing the way we learn a new language by using AI-powered speaking lessons to help you speak confidently, without feeling judged.

 

 

A Proven Method That Works With 4.5 Stars from 700+ Real Customers

 
 

 

 

 

Watch a bite-sized & engaging video lesson

Stay fully engaged with 250+ interactive video lessons that we've produced in our studio in 4K resolution. Every video lesson is interactive, informative, and beautifully produced to keep you engaged.

 


 

Learn a language by speaking it on day one and gain confidence without being judged

Become conversational fluent without feeling embarrassed by practicing your speaking skills from the comforts of your own home, going for a walk, or anywhere you want.

 


 

Chat live 1-on-1 with a professional teacher for a fully personalized learning experience

Learn even faster by booking live 1-on-1 language lessons with handpicked professional teachers in our network. With 1-on-1 live learning, you can get fully personalized lessons that are catered towards your goals, needs, and proficiency level. 

 


 

Real-life conversations (AI-powered speaking lessons)

No more boring flashcards and quiz-format exercises using only your fingers. Our speaking lessons feel like real-life conversations you'll have with a friend, family member, or co-worker. 

 

Real-time feedback (using speech recognition technology)

You'll get real-time feedback via our speech recognition technology. As you use the app more, we'll improve our accuracy, and your speaking lesson experience will continue to improve. It's like having a language coach in your pocket, 24/7.

 

Learn what you actually care about

Most of the language learning content out there are outdated. We've designed our curriculum from the ground up to make it fun, relevant, and relatable for today's generation of learners, such as how to talk to your AirBnB host, asking someone out, and ordering food at restaurants.

 

 

It's not just different. It's Language Learning 4.0 

 

 

As we already have developed much of the content around these languages below (and based on popular demand), we'll launch our beta with these 3 languages.

 

Next languages

After we launch our 1st languages, we'll actively work towards launching the following languages. To determine which language(s) we launch first, we'll ask our early pledgers to vote to help us decide the order.

story:
Building a Healthy, Happy, Thriving South Africa

 

  • My name is Thulani Solomon Makhoba. I was born and raised in Soweto, South Africa. I have a diploma in Project Management and I'm very passionate about the physical and emotional well-being of children, the goal of this appeal. 


     
  • Since 2003, I worked in many interactive programmes dealing with a variety of South African challenges such as HIV and AIDS, drug and substance abuse, directly impacting the lives of destitute orphans and vulnerable children. These programmes were successful as far as helping children deal with the symptoms of their suffering, but they did not deal with the root causes of these problems.
     
  • This is the reason why we believe it is  imperative to bring "Relationship Education" like Loving Classroom to South Africa, beginning in Soweto and then expanding to Johannesburg, Gauteng, and finally to be a national programme. Its holistic approach guides teachers and students to cultivate a lifetime of good relationships: at school, at home, with friends, at the future workplace, within communities and, eventually, between cultures and nations. In so doing, it  deals with the essence of what causes the problems listed above (a lack of love and friendship) and works to successfully prevent them. That's why I'm dedicating my life to bringing Relationship Education to South Africa. 


     
  • Loving Classroom is built on a foundation of 8 virtues: Respect, Compassion, Listening, Kindness, Gratitude, Love, Friendship (in the class) and Care (for society).
     
  • Last year, we ran a pilot programme in Soweto for 7 schools, with 71 teachers, 42 parents in school governing bodies, and 4,590 children. The principals, department heads and teachers reported REDUCED class disruption, bullying. truancy, drugs and alcohol abuse, racism, violence and fighting, as well as tribalism and INCREASED examination pass rates, tolerance, compassion and respect.

                              
    Data provided by principals and heads of department at our 7 pilot schools: Soweto - 2018

  • Consequently, the South African Gauteng Department of Education  has signed an agreement with Loving Classroom to run an official 3-year pilot programme. If successful, Loving Classroom will be incorporated into the official Department of Education State Curriculum.



    This will have an immense impact on our vulnerable and marginalized youth since it
    would mean that Relationship Education will be rolled out, with government funding, in all our schools.
     
  • This is where we need your help, because in the pilot stage, Loving Classroom is required to provide and finance textbooks and teacher training. (The government will provide the funding for the programme evaluation.)


     
  • Next year, we plan to run the programme in 58 disadvantaged schools in Soweto (21,000 students), that do not have the financial means to pay for training and textbooks.

    That's why we are crowdfunding: to ensure this government pilot programme is financed and a major success, and thereby establish Relationship Education as an official foundation for the South African educational system. In so doing: we will ensure the loving core of a healthy, happy, thriving South Africa, and maybe help to do the same for a peaceful, stable, successful Africa and world.

 

What We Need & What You Get
 

  • Next year's budget for 3 staff, 21,000 books, office, training costs and travel comes to $160,000 (US).
     
  • At cost price, each 208 page, fully illustrated textbook costs $5, You can download a standard edition from Amazon (for $10).
     
  • We have (or will have) raised $55,000 to cover the cost of staff, office, training expenses and travel. The remaining $105,000, for which we are turning to you for your compassionate support, is providing 21,000 students with their textbooks. We are asking you to help us finance the balance, so that we can focus all our energy on getting the job of excellent Relationship Education successfully incorporated into the 58 schools with which we have been commissioned to work.
     

We need to print 21,000 books.

Any level of support is deeply appreciated. At the top of this page you can click on  and enter any sum you choose - or we offer the following perks:

We will include your personalized dedication in all the 21,000 books we are printing as follows.
(In all cases, we will also send you a copy of the book, or copies for larger contributions.)
a) $100 (financing books for 20 children): a one-line dedication
b) $200 (financing books for 40 children): a 1/16 of page dedication
c) $500 (financing books for 100 children): a 1/8 of a page dedication
d) $1,000 (financing books for 200 children): a 1/4 page dedication
e) $5,000 (financing books for 1,000 children): a half page dedication
f) $10,000 (financing books for 2,000 children): a full page dedication
g) $20,000 (financing books for 4,000 children): a chapter dedication
h) $50,000 (financing books for 10,000 children): the whole book dedication

                                                      

The Impact

  • The expected impact of Loving Classroom will be to:

    a) Reduce class disruption, bullying. late coming, drugs and alcohol abuse, racism, violence and fighting, as well as tribalism.

    b) Strengthen a lifetime of caring, compassionate, trust-filled relationships for all students and future generations: at school, home, with friends, in the future workplace, within communities and, eventually, between cultures and nations.

     

Risks & Challenges

Failure to raise our fundraising target means we won't be able to work in the 58 schools assigned to us by the Ministry of Education.  We may thereby lose the good name and reputation we have accrued so far (as a result of  Loving Classroom's impressive successes to date), and possibly fail the pilot programme. That would be a serious blow for the future of a healthy, happy education system and our dream of a stable, thriving South Africa. Please, don't let that happen.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

STEP 1: Please take five minutes with a pen and paper (or whatever) to list all the people you feel may be interested in this campaign.

STEP 2:  Send an email to everyone in your list, asking them (if they haven't already done so), to support this campaign to provide 21,000 students with Loving Classroom textbooks. This is part of a greater journey to establish Relationship Education as a core part of our official school curriculum and thereby build  a healthy, peaceful, thriving future for South Africa.
 


 

THANK YOU VERY VERY MUCH!

story:
Hi, we are the iClever team! We introduce you a platform of online education. Video course replaces tradition education more and more within the time, so we came up with idea of creating iClever – an international platform of online education, which would combine all possible video courses from different countries. On iClever you can also post your own video courses and share your knowledge with the whole world.

 

iClever - Erasing borders in learning

For learning. This project can help you earn the knowledge you need and get new skills. On iClever platform all video courses will be translated to world main languages. The list of languages would be increased within the time.

Before starting the work on iClever website, all users would have to make a registration and fill the personal data. According to this data, the website would be translated automatically and all the videos would have subtitles on your language.

Just imagine, you only enter the website, write the topic you are interested in, and get high-quality video courses with all required information.

While purchasing the course, you would be offered a short-term or a long-term education plan. You would also get a feedback with course creator, so you would be able to contact and ask teacher any questions directly. You are not going to have any trouble with linguistic divide because we have already solved it. Our platform translates messages with no meaning corruption and you would get answers from a teacher on your language. The course that you purchase stays with you forever.

For work. After the registration, you would be able to not only get knowledge, but also share your own. Just follow the link «add a video course» and fill all the requirements for the video course. There would be shown: the whole structure for teacher to follow, rules and other agreements. Then your video course would be sent for processing. After processing it would be posted in the general list of sections/subjects/topics and would be available to purchase for everyone who is interested. After every purchase you would receive payment on your personal account or a card, which you added while making a registration.

If you wish to create your own video course on iClever for free, you need to go through these steps:

  1. Register on iClever website.
  2. Fill a form where you describe your video course.
  3. Then our manager will contact you and help you to make a plan of a video course creating.
  4. You film your video course (our specialists would help you with video editing if required).
  5. After an online course is done we will translate the subtitles on iClever languages (English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese), so everyone all over the world would see and understand your video course.
  6. After you create your video course it will appear on iClever platform.
  7. iClever withhold 20-25% from each sale iClever platform maintaining and keeping you from annoying advertisements.
You earn from each purchase of you course. In the end of every week money would be sent to you account, where you would be able to send them to your card or your bank account.

This way you may earn from your knowledge and skills.

Video courses idea is very interesting at this advanced time. That is why our team found partners that are going to post their video courses on our platform, even before the start of iClever platform. Thanks to them, we already have first video courses what will appear at the day of platform launch.

These are the video courses that we already have:

We wish to get funding on indiegogo for platform’s creating. To develop it with programmers, buy a server for the security of data. We also need funding for advertising campaign of the platform so everyone will know about iClever  and able to learn something new or share their knowledge.

Our team

iClever team includes ambitious, talented and creative people. We don’t delay until tomorrow, we act today. iClever is difficult, but very promising project. Such platform of online education as iClever is very needed on the online education market. But the idea itself is not enough, realization is very important and we undoubtedly claim that we will succeed. We will create an online education platform that would become worldwide famous and find lots of users.

The progress does not stand still. IT-technologies appear in our lives rapidly and we cannot live without them.

In the future, online courses would replace traditional education completely or partly. Because it’s much easier and saves much time.

iClever team looks into the future and realizes, that the world needs an international online education platform with high-quality courses on different subjects, where people can post their own courses. And we will help them.

iClever platform will not only help learning something new, but also assemble people all over the world.

No matter where you are from or how old you are, let’s learn and share knowledge together.
